attributes.action: Stop the sale of alcohol to people under 21 from Off  Licsense outlets and Supermarkets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We demand the government ban the sale of takeaway alcohol to any person under 21, this will help curb the drinking and mayhem thats in our streets, parks, public places and any venue thats used by our teenagers to consume alcohol. This will also help to stop teenagers from  breaking the law with violence and anti-social behaviour fuelled by alcohol.
It will also help to stop over 18s buying drink for their underage friends.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
